In England, in the seven days to 12 September, there were 162,811 new confirmed cases (287.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 September, there were 191,861 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (29,050 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 September is 6,303,792 (11,147.3 cases per 100,000 population).
